LanguageData.VAERoy_Orangutan.label: orangutan
LanguageData.VAERoy_Orangutan.description: A great ape invented and patented on Sophiamunda, orangutans are intelligent and can hold a normal conversation with humans. They are often used as home teachers in the Empire, educating young nobles in history, arts and correct etiquette.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> When holding sophisticated conversations with humans, they boost their social recreation. Furthermore, each conversation with an orangutan gives a little bit of XP to a random skill.
LanguageData.VAERoy_Orangutan.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.VAERoy_Orangutan.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.VAERoy_Orangutan.tools.3.label: head
